post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
As per our phone conversation here are the details of the job that I am recruiting for. Please let me know if you would be interested or if you know anyone else who would be interested.

They are interviewing for the position right now.

He is looking for contractors with more system admin/deployment experience – he still needs their development experience as well.

Subject: S27QXM - 2 x Java developers - 1 year - Lab in Markham -


This is for Sonny Sia at the lab – needs 2 people – he is cost sensitive so we don’t have much room on this

Request number
S27QXM

Project name
ibm.com

Skill number
001

Skill requested
Application Developer J2EE (Websphere)

Response due date
07/16/2010

Level requested
Journeyman 3

Education requested
B.Sc. (Comp.Sc. / Eng. )

Years of experience requested
3

Start date requested
08/02/2010

End date requested
01/28/2011

Standard time
1,104 HR - Hour

Criminal Reference Check (see page help for details)
0.00 CAD

Work shift
1

On-call coverage may be required.
Does not need to be on-call

Travel may be required.
Travel is not required.

Primary work location:
  

Country/Territory
Canada

City
MARKHAM

State /Region/ Province
Ontario

Work region
TORONTO

Comments to supplier
Looking for a WebSphere J2EE application developer who is also strong in software administration, configuration and install/deployment. Key SWG products are WebSphere App Server (WAS), DB2, FileNet, IHS, MDM, WMB, MQ and Cognos.


Amy Hoddinott
Senior Consultant
TES - THE EMPLOYMENT SOLUTION
Toll Free:     800.818.4744 x239
Telephone:   416.482.2420 x239
Fax:              416.482.9282
Email:          amyh@tes.net
Web:            www.tes.net
